Module com.darrenfinch.appointmentmanager
Package com.darrenfinch.appointmentmanager.common.di

Class ApplicationConfig

java.lang.Object
com.darrenfinch.appointmentmanager.common.di.ApplicationConfig
public class ApplicationConfig extends Object
Holds the application's primary dependency graph.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ApplicationConfig(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
    Constructs the primary dependency graph of the application and sets up the database connection.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicationConfig

      public ApplicationConfig(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Constructs the primary dependency graph of the application and sets up the database connection. The internal implementation of this method includes 5 lambdas that are callbacks for creating the controller factories that are used to create the screen controllers. They were used because they greatly helped to shorten the code.

      public void cleanup()
